@narendramodi Ji just the least I can do at the moment to fight against Corona. Please accept this small token from me Saptaparna from Shillong and yes thank you again for allowing us feeders to continue feeding for street animals

While we should be battling Covid19 as a nation, North Easterners in different metros of India are labelled "Corona" and subjected to racial abuse. Union Home Ministry has done nothing to address this racial prejudice at this crucial hour.
Just paraphrasing what a friend said - "If India ever comes up with a cure for CORONA, it will be called ROKONA." #COVID2019 #CoronavirusOutbreak #CoronaLockdown #coronavirus #LockdownWithoutPlan
Army should deploy to implement total lockdown in our country, so that we can beat corona

Help jobless poor amid corona lockdown Congress leader Shri Kapil Sibal has reiterated his party’s demand for financial help for the poor rendered #jobless due to #coronavirus scare in the country, demanding at least ₹10,000 each to them #IndiaMaangeNYAY
Is India filled with uneducated old swines? Addressing North easterners as ‘Chinky’ , ‘Momo’ and now ‘Corona Virus’ ? Wtf is wrong with these barbarians? God knows !!
Its. Not to kill covid 19 corona viruses. But its a way to support and pay respect to the personal engaged in medical services tirelessly. Try to respect others sentiments
And only in India u shall find the Corona festival .

The war against Covid19 isn't over, in fact it has just started. Please don't rush in to pat your own backs so early. This is an extremely serious situation, and please, please treat it as such. Desist from your usual game at least till the crisis is over.
The war against COVID19 is not over. In fact, this is just the beginning. Don't rush in to pat your own back so early.

From #COP25 Climate Change Conference Centre in December 2019 to #COVID19 Isolation Center in March 2020 - We were in Madrid 3 months ago to take action on addressing the climate emergency and now this same venue has more than 5000 beds to deal with patients infected in Spain!

Hi @amazonIN when will clamp down on these price gougers. I bought a pack of 10 with an MRP of 190, Cloudtail as the seller. The same product is being sold for 3500 now by this other seller . Just look at the reviews too - probably scamming people. #COVID19
